 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרַג‎</span>] **verb Pu\`al** ==be intertwined== (Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָרַג‎</span> Pi\`el ***enmesh, weave around***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***intertwine, involve***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְרַג‎</span> ***entwine***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***set in order, join, weave, mix***); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשׂרָ֑גוּ‎</span> [[Job.40.17|Job 40:17]] ***are intertwined*** (of sinews of hippopotamus). **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׂתָּֽרְגוּ‎</span> [[Lam.1.14|Lam 1:14]] ***they intertwine themselves*** (figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּשְׁעַי‎</span>).
